text: Cathy Cahlin Ryan is an American actress best known for her role as Corrine Mackey in the critically acclaimed crime drama series The Shield. She has also appeared in several other television series and films. Ryan is married to television producer and screenwriter Shawn Ryan, creator of The Shield. == Early life == Cathy Cahlin Ryan was born and raised in the United States. Little is publicly known about her early life and education, as she has kept her personal background private. == Career == Ryan began her acting career in the 1990s with small roles in television and film. She gained widespread recognition for her portrayal of Corrine Mackey, the wife of lead character Vic Mackey, in FX's The Shield (2002–2008). Her performance in the series was praised for its emotional depth and complex portrayal of a character caught in morally ambiguous situations. * Guest roles in shows like Judging Amy, Monk, and CSI: Crime Scene Investigation. * Appearances in independent films and TV movies. Though her role in The Shield remains her most notable, Ryan has continued to work in both television and film, often collaborating with her husband on projects. == Personal life == Ryan married Shawn Ryan, a television producer and showrunner, in 1998. The couple has two children. She often supports her husband's creative endeavors and has occasionally appeared in cameo roles in his productions. Ryan is known for maintaining a low public profile, focusing on her family and select acting projects. == Filmography == === Television === * The Shield (2002–2008) – Corrine Mackey * Judging Amy – Guest role * Monk – Guest role * CSI: Crime Scene Investigation – Guest role === Film === * Independent films and minor roles in TV movies == Awards and recognition == While Ryan has not won major acting awards, her performance in The Shield has been acknowledged as an integral part of the show's success. == Related pages == * The Shield * Shawn Ryan * FX (TV channel) == References == == Other websites == * Cathy Cahlin Ryan on IMDb * Cathy Cahlin Ryan on TV Guide Category:American actors Category:Living people
title: Cathy Cahlin Ryan
